ROOT.TXT: --INTRASTAT ANISERCO BE : IN select pkparpostes.get_postvac1(999, 0, 807, fadpays) "Country", 1 "Transaction", 1 "Region", uatvaln "Goods code", sum(ddafqte * ARUPBRU) "Net Mass(Kg)", decode(sum(ARUPBRU * ddafqte), 0, sum(ddafqte), null) "Supplementary", sum(ddafpun * ddafqte) "Value in euro" from cfdenfac, cfdgbfac t, fouadres, foufilie, cliadres, sitclirel, cfddtdoc, artul, artuvattri, clidgene, foudgene where efarfou = gfarfou and efacfin = gfacfin and efacfin = foucfin and foutype != 3 and exists (select 1 from cfdendoc where edcrfou = efarfou and edccfin = efacfin and edcsite = sclsite and efadatf between sclddeb and scldfin and sclncli = adrncli and adrpays = 56)--BE and efadatf between ffiddeb and ffidfin and efacfin = fadcfin and fficfin = efacfin and efafilf = ffinfilf and fficomm = fadadre and ddarfou = efarfou and ddacfin = efacfin and arucinl = ddacinl and uatccla = 'INTSTAT' and uatcinv = arucinluvc and fadpays != 56 and clincli = adrncli and efadatf between TO_DATE(':D_DEB:', 'DD/MM/RR') and TO_DATE(':D_FIN:', 'DD/MM/RR') group by fadpays, uatvaln
